question: a hadith wherein Nabi SAW asked a sahabi to remove his shoes in the qabrastan
answer:
QUESTION

I have been given a hadith wherein Nabi SAW asked a sahabi to remove his shoes in the qabrastan.plz explain the hadith to me and is this a forgotten sunnath.  Abu Dawood.shukran

ANSWER


Share:

Nabi [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam] advised the Sahaabi to remove his shoes because he had some impurity under his shoes. (Awn al-Ma’bood vol.6 pg.138; Cairo)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
